feed.title: Little Grand Rapids - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Little Grand Rapids
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
